name: Baby Star Vagabond | Jam
description:
********************************************************************

Hi! We are Pere Prim ( Programer) and Diana Ridaura (Game Design and Art) and we made this tiny game for A Jam About Time.

The game is about a baby alien who gets stucked in an island. It needs your help to recover its powers and continue his jouney across Space.

The game is fully controlled with mouse (movement / interaction) and Esc to pause/exit.

We want to thank Peter Jojaio for his help developing the narrative, and Carlos Garcia for taking care of the game's sound&music. 

The game will be updated soon with a proper ending, and some minor cute details. 

see you soon!

********************************************************************
